doctor.name: Dr. Md. Saiful Malek
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Saiful Malek is a Gastroenterologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Medicine), MD (Gastroenterology), MACP (USA). He is a Assistant Professor, Gastroenterology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Saiful Malek at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 4pm to 6:30pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Shafiqul Ehsan Rana
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Shafiqul Ehsan Rana is a Gastroenterologist in Mymensingh. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Gastroenterology), MACP (USA), CCD (BIRDEM). He is a Consultant, Gastroenterology at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Nexus Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Shafiqul Ehsan Rana at Nexus Hospital, Mymensingh is 5pm to 7pm (Closed: Wed & Friday).
